biography.bio: Argentinian actress. Daughter of a theater writer, and sister of the writer Carlos Gorostiza. At the age of 15 she escapes from a religious school to win a beauty contest in Buenos Aires. She debuted in cinema in 1947 and in theater in 1950. She worked in around 20 films in Argentina and in 1956 she went to Madrid. She was married to the Argentinian actor and director Juan Carlos Thorry and later to the Venezeulan actor Espartaco Santoni.
biography.name: Analía Gadé

biography.birthName: Alberto Manuel Rodríguez Gallego Gonzáles de Mendoza
biography.bio: Alberto de Mendoza was born on January 21, 1923 in Buenos Aires, Argentina as Alberto Manuel Rodríguez Gallego Gonzáles de Mendoza. He was an actor, known for Horror Express (1972), Tapas (2005) and The Boss (1958). He died on December 12, 2011 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Alberto de Mendoza

biography.bio: Pepe Rubio was born on September 10, 1931 in Lubrín, Almería, Andalucía, Spain as José Rubio Urrea. He was an actor, known for Siempre es domingo (1961), Enseñar a un sinvergüenza (1970) and Girl from La Mancha (1963). He died on March 15, 2012 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Pepe Rubio

biography.bio: His professional debut in 1934 with the Society of Enrique Rambal in a spectacular production of "Around the World in 80 Days." Upon completion of the Spanish Civil War, became part of the Society of Isabel Garcés Between 1940 and 1943 played important roles in various films. However, he soon returned to the theater, forming his own company, specializing in comedy. Stay in front of her, away from the film, until the '60s, when his face begins to lavish on the silver screen and television
biography.name: Ismael Merlo

biography.bio: Katia Loritz was born on November 4, 1932 in Arbon, Switzerland. She was an actress, known for Atraco a las tres (1962), What Have I Done to Deserve This? (1984) and Las manos sucias (1957). She was married to Jorge Pedro Pérez del Pulgar. She died on August 16, 2015 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Katia Loritz

biography.bio: Matilde Muñoz Sampedro was born on March 2, 1900 in Madrid, Spain. She was an actress, known for Death of a Cyclist (1955), Main Street (1956) and Valencia (1957). She was married to Rafael Bardem. She died on April 14, 1969 in Madrid.
biography.name: Matilde Muñoz Sampedro

biography.bio: José Franco was born on April 25, 1908 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as José Franco Pumarega. He was an actor, known for Welcome Mr. Marshall! (1953), The Priest (1978) and Une femme est passée... (1965). He died on January 30, 1980 in Madrid.
biography.name: José Franco

biography.placeOfBirth: Donostia-San Sebastián, Guipúzcoa, País Vasco, Spain
biography.bio: Paula Martel was born in 1945 in Donostia-San Sebastián, Guipúzcoa, País Vasco, Spain. She is an actress, known for Le sadique Baron Von Klaus (1962), Atraco a las tres (1962) and Los guerrilleros (1963). She was previously married to José María Mompín.
biography.name: Paula Martel

biography.bio: José María Tasso was born on February 7, 1934 in Madrid, Spain as José María Tasso Tena. He was an actor, known for Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down! (1989), Le roi ébahi (1991) and Villarriba y Villabajo (1994). He died on February 9, 2003 in León, León, Castilla y León, Spain.
biography.name: José María Tasso

biography.bio: Pilarín Casanova is an actress, known for Azafatas con permiso (1959), Tú y yo somos tres (1962) and La vida por delante (1958).
biography.name: Pilarín Casanova

biography.bio: Venancio Moreno is an actor, known for The Great Swindle (1971), Tú y yo somos tres (1962) and No desearás al vecino del quinto (1970).
biography.name: Venancio Moreno

biography.bio: Pilar Cano is an actress, known for Eusebia (2011), 091 Policía al habla (1960) and Los claveles (1960).
biography.name: Pilar Cano

biography.bio: Beni Deus was born on December 12, 1919 in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain as Venancio Deus Mejuto. He was an actor, known for Furtivos (1975), L'emprise du destin (1952) and They Came to Rob Las Vegas (1968). He died on March 16, 1989 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Beni Deus

biography.bio: Born in 1933 in Barcelona. Her first artistic formation was acquired in the Spanish University Theater. She obtained great work triumphs like "La Celestina" or "El realquilado". Very characteristic voice, very popular through cinematographic casts, great comedian, although she interpreted with equal depth dramatic films. Among others films, worked in "La gran familia", "Vivan los novios!" or "El espiritu de la colmenta". She worked in television too. Sadly, she passed away of cancer in Madrid, the 12 of September of 1979, hardly 46 years of age. She's buried in the South Cemetery of Madrid.
biography.name: Laly Soldevila

biography.bio: Erasmo Pascual was born on May 6, 1903 in Ribadavia, Ourense, Galicia, Spain as Erasmo Pascual Colmenero. He was an actor, known for Le bourreau (1963), Furtivos (1975) and Bell from Hell (1973). He was married to Rafaela Aparicio. He died on June 7, 1975 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Erasmo Pascual

companyCreditsSimple.name: Internacional Productora de Peliculas Argentinas, S.R.C.
